item.title: 英格兰银行行长贝利称民粹主义恐加剧全球问题
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁·贝利表示，民粹主义正使应对全球经济挑战变得更加困难，它无法解决经济增长乏力和生活水平低下的问题。【原文：Populism is making it harder to tackle the world’s economic challenges and is no answer to the problems of weak growth and living standards, Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said.】

item.title: 据称，Alantra等公司正考虑出售西班牙Salto Systems的股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Salto Systems SL公司的一批股东正考虑出售其持有的这家西班牙电子锁制造商的股份。【原文：A group of shareholders in Salto Systems SL are weighing a sale of their stakes in the Spanish electronic locks manufacturer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 过去十年间美国石油行业流失的40%岗位不会再回来了
item.description:
自2014年页岩气泡沫破灭以来，石油巨头们在生产效率方面取得了显著提升，仅凭少量劳动力便实现了创纪录的产量。

Oil majors have grown more efficient in the years since the shale bubble burst in 2014, pumping record production with a fraction of the workforce.

item.title: 华尔街对股市表现最佳板块意见分歧
item.description: 在地区地缘政治紧张局势加剧的背景下，能源股的强劲涨势持续跑赢大盘，引发了关于这波涨势能持续多久的讨论。【原文：A market-beating rally in energy stocks amid flaring geopolitical tensions has sparked a debate about how long the momentum will last.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预测ASML股价在乐观情景下将飙升70%
item.description: 摩根士丹利阐述了其看涨论点，解释为何投资者应买入ASML控股公司股票。该行表示，在最乐观的情景下，随着芯片制造商加大支出以满足人工智能领域激增的需求，该股未来有望上涨70%。【原文：Morgan Stanley laid out its bullish case for why investors should buy ASML Holding NV shares, saying in the most optimistic scenario the stock has a 70% rally ahead as chipmakers ramp up spending to meet soaring demand for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英特尔延续复苏势头，投资者押注代工业务增长
item.description: 英特尔公司年初的强劲反弹表明，投资者对其赢得新代工客户日益乐观，这将使该公司重返2024年看似已放弃的人工智能领域。【原文：Intel Corp.’s dramatic rally to start the year shows investors are increasingly optimistic about the chipmaker gaining new foundry customers, putting it back into the artificial intelligence trade it appeared to abandon in 2024.】

item.title: 巴克莱称印度推进自贸协定或难抵消美国关税拖累
item.description: 巴克莱银行经济学家表示，印度近期签署和拟议的多项自由贸易协定，可能不足以抵消美国关税对这个南亚国家出口的影响。【原文：India’s recent spate of signed and proposed free-trade agreements may not be sufficient to offset the impact of US tariffs on the South Asian country’s exports, economists at Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 韩国交易所考虑推出风险较高的ETF以吸引散户投资者
item.description: 韩国主要证券交易所正与金融监管机构商讨放宽对高风险杠杆交易所交易产品的禁令，因本土股市创纪录的上涨未能吸引散户投资者重返国内市场。【原文：South Korea’s main bourse is in talks with financial authorities to ease rules that ban high-risk leveraged exchange-traded products, as a record rally in local shares has failed to draw retail investors back to the domestic market.】

item.title: 船只逐步重返红海迎来关键里程碑
item.description: 在避开红海航线两年多后，全球主要集装箱航运公司正逐步重返这条东西向贸易的重要航道，并表示该航线已恢复安全航行。【原文：After more than two years of avoiding the Red Sea, the world’s leading container lines are inching back to the vital lane for east-west trade and indicating it looks safe to navigate again.】

item.title: 特朗普对鲍威尔的追击恐令美联储观察者难以解读经济动向
item.description: 特朗普政府近期对美联储的最新抨击，加剧了市场预期：杰罗姆·鲍威尔将在5月结束主席任期后继续留任理事会——这将使全球最具影响力的央行内部形成一个竞争性的权力中心，即便鲍威尔本人并不情愿。【原文：The Trump administration’s latest attack on the Federal Reserve has stoked expectations that Jerome Powell will stay on the Board of Governors after his term as chair ends in May — setting up the optics of a rival center of influence inside the world’s most powerful central bank, even if Powell doesn’t want it.】

item.title: 印度卢比跌至一个月低点，因股票资金外流加剧
item.description: 印度卢比跌至一个月低点，因外国资金持续流出国内股市，且央行支持力度有限。【原文：The Indian rupee fell to a one-month low amid persistent foreign outflows from domestic equities and muted central bank support.】

item.description: 英镑、英国国债和英国股市今年全线上涨的势头，将面临新一轮经济数据的考验。【原文：A clean sweep of gains for the pound, gilts and UK stocks this year will be tested by a fresh batch of economic data.】

item.title: 严寒天气推高印度电力需求至年内峰值
item.description: 印度1月份的峰值电力需求已超过夏季通常较高的用电量，因寒流导致全国范围内取暖设备使用量激增。【原文：India’s peak power demand in January has overshot typically higher consumption in the summer months, as a cold snap boosted the use of heaters across the country.】

item.title: 杰富瑞伍德因量子计算威胁抛售比特币
item.description: 量子计算这一曾经遥不可及的威胁，已促使一位备受瞩目的市场策略师放弃比特币，这凸显出人们对该加密货币安全性的疑虑正逐渐渗透到主流投资组合的考量中。【原文：The once-distant threat of quantum computing has prompted one of the most closely followed market strategists to walk away from Bitcoin, underscoring how doubts over the token’s security are creeping into mainstream portfolio thinking.】

item.title: 日本央行宣布将于下周开始出售所持ETF持仓
item.description: 日本央行表示，将于周一开始出售其持有的交易所交易基金，按当前计划的进度推进，这项计划可能需要一个多世纪才能完成。【原文：The Bank of Japan said it will start selling its holdings of exchange-traded funds on Monday, a project that may take more than a century if it proceeds at the currently planned pace.】

item.title: 保时捷销量创16年来最大跌幅，受中国市场疲软及车型缺口影响
item.description: 保时捷公司去年交付量下滑10%，创下自2009年全球金融危机冲击市场以来的最大跌幅，主要源于电动汽车需求疲软及中国市场萎缩。【原文：Porsche AG’s deliveries fell 10% last year, the steepest drop since 2009 when the global financial crisis roiled markets, following weak demand for electric vehicles and a slump in China.】

item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度ASG医院私营公司已聘请五家银行，计划在今年下半年进行首次公开募股，募资规模最高可达5亿美元。【原文：India’s ASG Hospital Pvt. has hired five banks for an initial public offering of as much as $500 million in the second half of the year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description: 亿万富豪德尔维基奥家族旗下的投资公司德尔芬有限责任公司否认正与裕信银行就出售其持有的西恩纳蒙特迪帕斯基银行17.5%股份进行谈判。【原文：Delfin Sarl, the investment firm of the billionaire Del Vecchio family, denied it’s in talks with UniCredit SpA over potentially selling its 17.5% stake in rival lender Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.】

item.title: 莫比乌斯避开创纪录黄金，因美元反弹风险
item.description: 资深投资者马可·莫比乌斯表示，黄金在经历历史性上涨后已失去吸引力，并警告称美元可能反弹，这可能削弱贵金属价格——而当前市场普遍仍持坚定看涨态度。【原文：Veteran investor Mark Mobius said gold has become unattractive after its historic rally, warning that a potential rebound in the dollar could undercut precious metals at a time when much of the market remains firmly bullish.】

item.title: 南非延长在线博彩税征求意见截止日期

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格单周飙升20%，"完美风暴"冲击市场情绪

item.title: 欧洲最大初创企业防务基金筹资5亿欧元
item.description: 德国投资机构数字转型资本合伙公司正筹建欧洲史上规模最大的国防初创企业专项风险投资基金，该基金目标规模达5亿欧元（约合5.8亿美元），目前已签约首批主要投资者。【原文：German investor Digital Transformation Capital Partners GmbH is on track to raise Europe’s largest-ever dedicated venture capital fund for defense startups, signing its first big backers for a fund targeting €500 million ($580 million).】

item.title: 菲律宾采取措施提振因腐败丑闻受挫的投资者信心

item.title: 渣打银行考虑印度卡业务部门的多种方案，因零售业务收缩
